text:
I can’t use *custom module* anymore
When I click on a custom module in a page to edit it I have this following issue :
*Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read property ‘loadPromise’ of undefined*
There was an issue.. it should be fixed now.
Make sure you open your template and re-save it

Thanks a lot <@U38EZFVFE> . It’s fixed right now.
What a strange and disturbing issue !
